en: Start the program.\nThis node will initially have the focus.
Connect to the node NODE.\nSome commands will use this node as a target instead of the local node they run on.
Disconnect from the node if connected.
Move focus in different directions depending on whether CONDITION is true or false.
Take over the local node or the node connected to.\nThe amount of control gained over the target node increases with POWER as well as CPU usage.
Protects the local node from being captured.
Slows down programs running on connected nodes.
Moves the program to the target node. The target node has to be under your control.
Make a copy of the program that will run on the local node.
Pauses the program for a TIME seconds.
A set containing all adjacent nodes.
A set containing all adjacent hostile nodes.
A set containing all adjacent nodes controled by you.
The local node the program runs on.
A randomly chosen adjacent node controled by the enemy.
A randomly chosen adjacent node controled by you.
Is there a controled node adjacent?
Is there any hostile program running on any adjacent node?
